content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)

### Coal transportation system
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that connects the burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) to a wooden chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)

### Storage facilities
Consists of three wooden chests at positions(x=45.5, y=-80.5), (x=44.5, y=-81.5), and (x=43.5, y=-79.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity
- Make sure the entity is capable of accepting the items you are trying to insert

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity

### Errors due to output being blocked
- Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of a burner mining drill to prevent output from being blocked by items on the ground
